name: Roll Of Dimensions
description:
~ A dice-driven top down shooter falling apart in a cyber world.

"In the even harmony of the odds, stood a dice controlling the vast dimensions of the realm. After balanced prosperity for thousands of years, one night of darkness forever tipped the odds towards evil… 

Creatures from the most nefarious of worst dimensions emerged in order to shift the realm to their ruling. They will have to destroy the dice of life first… and you, protector, cannot let that happen."

Controls:

  • WASD / Arrows : Move
  • Right/Left Click: Shoot

Gameplay:

  • The dice decides the dimensions the world will be in, granting a bonus fighting enemies from that particular dimension.
  • Two weapon magazines for shooting system with random-roll bullet refilling. (Left/Right mouse buttons)
  • Protect the Dice of Life

Made in 48 hours for GMTK 2022 Game Jam
